bibl.title: Dispatch from to J.C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener: United States Consulate at St Paul de Loanda W.C.A March 10th 1882
div1.p: L.aR. du Verge to Dept of State
Encloses oath of office and official band.
United States Consulate at St Paul de Loanda W.C.A. March 10th 1882
The Honorable J.C. Bancroft Davis Asst. Sectry. of State Washington D.C.

Sir I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of formal appointment paper . 2. 3. together with forms of oath and official hands. In reply I have the honor to hereby accept office of Consul of the United States of St. Paul de Loanda.

I have also to state that I was born in the state of France, that I am a naturalized citizen of the U.S. Evidence of which I have lodged in the Dept. and that I am appointed to my present office from the state of Maryland and my residence is the city of Baltimore and that I have
here resided in Portugal or any of its independence
I have the honorable Sir Your obt servt.
Enclosure Offical Band and oath of office.
